Welcome to cottontail’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Cottontial Error classes and functions.

class errors.CottontailBaseError[source]¶

Base exception class for Cottontail errors in Python.

class errors.CottontailError(message, code)[source]¶

A generic error for the Cottontail client

Args:
message (str): Name of the error message to pass code (int): Numeric code of the error to display
class queue.QueueBase(exchange_name='', hostname='localhost', port=5672, logger=<logging.Logger object at 0x11068f350>)[source]¶

A service base class for implementing work queue messaging patterns using the RabbitMQ library.

class queue.QueueServer(exchange_name='', hostname='localhost', port=5672, logger=<logging.Logger object at 0x11068f350>)[source]¶

A server class for publishing messages to a queue.

A worker class for consuming messages in a queue.

A service base class for implementing pub/sub messaging patterns using the RabbitMQ library.

A server class for publishing messages in a pub/sub pattern.

Overwritten methods:
